metadata.title: CVE-2016-7969 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The wrap_lines_smart function in ass_render.c in libass before 0.13.4allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read)via unspecified vectors, related to "0/3 line wrapping equalization."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-7969` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libass9 - 1:0.13.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libass package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.13.4-2').
